summary: The test-worker-no-workflows test intermittently fails with a GracefulShutdownPeriodExpiredError timeout while waiting for the worker to shut down gracefully, occurring some of the time during integration test runs.
userImpact: Developers experience flaky test runs due to intermittent worker shutdown timeouts, making test suite reliability uncertain.
resolutionDetails: The worker shutdown process has changed significantly since initial report, and the error has not been observed recently, indicating the issue was resolved through architectural improvements.
keyQuote: Haven't seen this error recently. Also, the Worker shutdown process has changed a lot since this was initially reported, so it seems very reasonable to think that this has already been fixed.
